description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Chris Read - Senior Systems Engineer at DRW

ABSTRACT
Excitement over DevOps has grown significantly since the first DevOpsDays conference in Ghent in 2009, but most of the tools and literature carry the implicit assumption that you are running an application or web service on an Infrastructure as a Service [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Bare%20Metal%20DevOps

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: Bare Metal DevOps
